title: Lease today! No extra charge for contentment and relaxation!
posting_body: Welcome To The Best of TacomaBella Vista is a distinctive, hillside community in Tacoma.
Enjoy the privacy of our retreat-like property as well as the convenience of easy access to the freeway and major shopping areas.
Our one- and two-bedroom floor plans have all the amenities you deserve, including full-size washers and dryers and private patios or decks, many with incredible mountain and city views.
As a resident you can relax on the sun deck with views of Mt. Rainier, work out in the fitness center and spend time with friends in the residents' lounge with free WiFi.
A great location and beautiful mountain views make Bella Vista a perfect place to live.
-Close To Major Employers Including Joint Base Lewis-McChord
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
